Package persistence

Class MapFileAlteration

java.lang.Object
persistence.MapFileAlteration
public class MapFileAlteration
extends java.lang.Object
class that defines creating, saving, reading and loading map files into the game
Version:
build 1
Author:
Rohit, Raghav

  • Constructor Details

    • MapFileAlteration

      public MapFileAlteration()

  • Method Details

    • readMapFile

      public void readMapFile()
      Reads a map file from the map package. Data is extracted in the following manner: 1. When it reads the line "MAP": extracts name of the map 2. When it reads the line "CONTINENTS_TABLE": data below are the continents and their associated id 3. When it reads the line "COUNTRIES_TABLE": data below are the countries, their associated id and which continent they belong to using continent id. 4. When it reads the line "BORDERS_TABLE" data below are: first number is the country's id and every number after it are the countries that border it using their id.

    • addContinent

      public ResponseWrapper addContinent​(Continent p_continent)
      Method to add a continent in the map and returns alert of successful operation
      Parameters:
      p_continent - a continent object to be added to the map
      Returns:
      ReponseWrapper temp object to alert player of the status after adding the continent

    • addCountry

      public ResponseWrapper addCountry​(Country p_country)
      Method to add a country in the map and returns alert of successful operation
      Parameters:
      p_country - a country object to be added to the map
      Returns:
      ReponseWrapper temp object to alert player of the status after adding the country

    • addNeighbour

      public ResponseWrapper addNeighbour​(Country p_mainCountry, Country p_neighbourCountry)
      Method for adding a specific country as a neighbor of another country
      Parameters:
      p_mainCountry - the key country
      p_neighbourCountry - the neighboring country to the key country
      Returns:
      ReponseWrapper temp object to alert player of the status after adding a neighboring country

    • saveMap

      public ResponseWrapper saveMap​(java.lang.String p_mapFileName)
      Method for saving a map in the event of creation or editing
      Parameters:
      p_mapFileName -
      Returns:
      alert to show map has been successfully saved

    • showmap

      public ResponseWrapper showmap()
      Method for outputting in table format, the complete details of the current map in play Information about the map include: 1. Country Name 2. Continent Name 3. Bordering Countries 4. Player information 5. Continents controlled by player
      Returns:
      alert for successful showing of map

    • getCountriesList

      public java.lang.String getCountriesList​(java.util.List<Country> countriesList)
      method to get countries list in the form of a string
      Parameters:
      countriesList -
      Returns:
      list of countries as a string if the string length is greater than 0, else return empty

    • removeContinent

      public ResponseWrapper removeContinent​(Continent p_continent)
      Method to remove continent from the map, it should be removed from the following: 1. continents list 2. countries list (all countries that belong to the deleted continent must also be deleted) 3. continentsCountries map: a mapping key/value pair of continent and list of countries that belong to that continent 4. borders map: a mapping key/value pair of country and list of countries that borders the key When deleting a continent we need to ensure that all countries in that continent is deleted and ensure that the remaining countries do not share a border with the deleted countries.
      Parameters:
      p_continent -
      Returns:
      alert to player to show successful deletion of continent

    • removeCountry

      public ResponseWrapper removeCountry​(Country country)
      Method to remove country from the map, it should be removed from the following: 1. countries list 2. continentsCountries map: a mapping key/value pair of continent and list of countries that belong to that continent 3. borders map: a mapping key/value pair of country and list of countries that borders the key When deleting a country, we should ensure that other countries that used to border that country reflect that change and also delete that country from their borders list.
      Parameters:
      country -
      Returns:
      alert to player to show successful deletion of country

    • removeNeighbour

      public ResponseWrapper removeNeighbour​(Country mainCountry, Country neighbourCountry)
      Method for removing a country from another country's list of neighbors. That change should be reflected in borders map. The borders map is searched by the country key, its neighbor list is access and search until param: neighbourCountry is found in the list and deleted
      Parameters:
      mainCountry - key value in the borders map
      neighbourCountry - country to be removed in the list of countries in borders map
      Returns:
      alert that neighboring country has been successfully removed

    • validateMap

      public ResponseWrapper validateMap()
      Method to validate the map once a change has been made. For example we want to add a country into a map with a continent that does not exist, then it's an error that should not occur.
      Returns:
      alert either the map is validated or alert a specific error message

    • getMapModel

      public MapModel getMapModel()
